statements: DELETE FROM patent_applications WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'Pending' AND applicant_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM application_updates WHERE application_id = 100 AND update_text = 'Application rejected';

DELETE FROM product_details WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Pharmaceuticals';
DELETE FROM products WHERE manufacturer = 'Sample Inc';
DELETE FROM patent_updates WHERE application_id IN (SELECT application_id FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'pending');
